name: 1 Machine, 1 Shot
description:
This game was started 4 days before the deadline, so it is still a little rusty 😉

As my 2nd game made with the Pixel Game Engine, you play as a machine with only 1 shot to get through the barriers in the level to the exit.

Place your path with the mouse, Press Space to run your path, then use the mouse to shoot 1 SHOT to take down a barrier in your path.

Artwork by Andrew Koffel (Twitch: GhostaxGaming)
